desc: Dutch Oven Apple Crisp Recipe - Dutch Oven Apple Crisp
Apple Crisp II Recipe and Video - Cinnamon-spiced apples are baked with a sweet oat crumble topping in this easy apple crisp. Serve warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
Apple Crisp with Oat Topping Recipe and Video - Sliced fresh apples tossed with cinnamon bake under a topping with oats, flour, brown sugar, and butter in this simple fall dessert idea.
Apple Crisp - Perfect and Easy Recipe and Video - Butter, flour, sugar, cinnamon, and a pinch of salt make a quick and simple topping for fresh sliced apples.
Apple Oatmeal Crisp Recipe and Video - Apples are baked with a crunchy oat crust on the top and bottom.
Oatmeal Cookie Apple Crisp Recipe and Video - The crunchy, chewy components of an oatmeal cookie combine with buttery apple slices in this tasty oatmeal cookie apple crisp recipe.
Crispiest Apple Crisp Recipe and Video - Rolled oats and Grape Nuts(R) make a crunchy topping for this classic apple crisp.

Easy Apple Crisp Recipe and Video - A sweet, crumbly cake mix mixture is spooned over sliced apples and water, and baked in a 9x13-inch pan until the apples are tender and the topping is brown and bubbly.
Fern's Apple Crisp Recipe - Apples, brown sugar, cinnamon, and oatmeal are combined to create this simple and quick apple crisp dessert that's sure to please a crowd.

Apple, Cranberry, and Pear Crisp Recipe - A splendid concoction of cubed apples and pears, dried cranberries, a bit of flour, honey, and lemon juice is spooned into a baking pan, and then covered with a crumbly butter and nut mixture. Forty-five minutes later, the crisp is brown and beautiful.

Apple Betty Recipe - Simple and delicious, this no crust pie is a pie plate filled with a delightful heap of apples sprinkled with orange juice, and topped with a crumbly sugar, flour, and butter mixture with hints of nutmeg and cinnamon. It bakes in less than an hour and is lovely served warm.
Cinnamon Roll Apple Crisp Recipe and Video - Cinnamon roll dough is the crust in this sweet apple crisp that is topped with icing for a decadent dessert for Thanksgiving or Christmas.
Stove Top Blueberry Grunt Recipe - Buttermilk dumplings are simmered in a sweet blueberry filling on the stove top, creating a blueberry grunt in less than an hour.
Apple Crisp III Recipe - No oats in this simple apple crisp -- just cinnamon spiced apples covered in a lightly sweet, buttery crust.
Apple Maple Crumble Pie Recipe - Maple syrup-sweetened apples are baked with an oat topping for this easy apple crisp.
Apple-Cranberry Crumble Recipe - Fresh apples and cranberries are dotted with raisins and walnuts and blanketed with a buttery crumble topping in this delightful fall dessert recipe.
Bumbleberry Crumble  Recipe - Showcase your favorite mixed berries and other fruits in this summer bumbleberry crumble that's easier than pie.
Toaster Oven Apple Crisp Recipe - If you're craving apple crisp, this single-serving recipe - prepared in the toaster oven - is a tasty solution.
Apple Cider Crisp  Recipe - A duo of apples and apple cider really amp up the fruity flavor of this apple crisp, while sweet melted caramel adds an unexpected surprise in every bite.
